Posts.EditableText: I'm not sure if I sure be telling anyone this, so I'll provide a little snippet... Mr. Alex Warren, the great Quest programmer himself, has included a new feature for the upcoming version of QDK... 4.03... that adds a dimension of flexibility to game creation and playability that, as far as I know, no other text system uses. Now, don't get your head spinning too fast. I don't want you to believe you get a free car with an update or something ridiculous like that, but, I think anyways, that it is a cool feature. Shhh... yah... 4.03 some time in the near future. (I'm not in trouble, am I Alex?)
Posts.HTML:
I'm not sure if I sure be telling anyone this, so I'll provide a little snippet...

Mr. Alex Warren, the great Quest programmer himself, has included a new feature for the upcoming version of QDK... 4.03... that adds a dimension of flexibility to game creation and playability that, as far as I know, no other text system uses. Now, don't get your head spinning too fast. I don't want you to believe you get a free car with an update or something ridiculous like that, but, I think anyways, that it is a cool feature.

Shhh... yah... 4.03 some time in the near future.
